peril.model.combat

Class CombatView

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.model.combat.CombatView

  • public class CombatView
extends java.lang.Object
    Denotes the results of a CombatRound being processed by the CombatHelper.
    Since:
    1.01.01
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    CombatHelper, CombatRound
